title: 3 Cheap Tech Stocks to Buy on the Dip as the Nasdaq Sinks
text: Here are three cheap tech stocks trading for under $20 a share that investors might want to consider buying amid the market pullback.

title: Nvidia CEO confident in company's growth prospects even if Arm acquisition does not happen
text: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang told "Mad Money" host Jim Cramer that the company would "be huge no matter what."

title: Nvidia Investors Are Pulling Back On Q4 Results, But These Analysts Still Like Chipmaker's Potential
text: NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ: NVDA) reported better-than-expected quarterly results Wednesday, but the stock is slipping amid a sector-wide tech sell-off and concerns about a potential slowdown in data center growth. The Nvidia Analysts: Needham analyst Rajvindra Gill maintained a Buy rating and upped the price target from $700 to $800.

title: Nvidia Stock Is Slumping After Earnings. Bitcoin Is Partly To Blame.
text: Nvidia shares fell 8% Thursday, despite strong results from the chip company. Bad memories around Bitcoin are one reason for the selloff.

title: Why NVIDIA Shares Stumbled Today, After an Impressive Earnings Report
text: The soaring stock was arguably due for a correction, and some investors worry that the end of this cryptocurrency boom could hurt NVIDIA's business.

title: Self-driving truck technology startup TuSimple nears stock offering
text: Self-driving truck technology developer TuSimple expects to file a prospectus to sell public stock as soon as next week, according to published reports and people close to the situation. The company, with offices in San Diego and Beijing, has 50 Level 4 autonomous trucks running paid freight in Southwestern states.

title: The Ratings Game: Nvidia stock falls as analysts ‘nitpick' data-center results in record earnings report
text: Nvidia Corp. shares declined Thursday after the chip maker's strong results and outlook met with some pushback when it came to the company's data-center segment.

title: 5 ETFs to Watch as Nvidia Tops Q4 Earnings, Guides Higher
text: Nvidia outpaced the Zacks Consensus Estimate on earnings and revenues when it reports Q4 earnings. The company offered an upbeat guidance for the ongoing quarter.

title: NVIDIA (NVDA) Q4 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Up Y/Y
text: NVIDIA's (NVDA) fourth-quarter fiscal 2021 earnings reflect benefits of higher demand for chips used in gaming consoles and data centers amid the work-and-learn-at-home, and gaming wave.

title: Analysts Blast NVDA With Bull Notes After Earnings
text: The shares of NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ:NVDA) are taking a step back this morning, down 3.4% at $560.22, following its fourth-quarter earnings report.

title: NVIDIA's Earnings Report Was Stellar (Again) -- but Not Good Enough for All Investors
text: The AI-driven data center and gaming businesses set new quarterly sales records.

title: Nvidia Is A Combination Of Dividend Growth And Growth, But Even After Q4, Valuation Is Challenging
text: Nvidia reported strong fiscal 2021 results. The company is leading in all key business segments.

title: Nvidia Drops, Moderna Pops, and Stocks Are Dented By Higher Rates
text: Stocks were down Thursday as yet another day of aggressively rising interest rates dented tech stocks.

title: NVIDIA Doesn't Want Cryptocurrency Miners to Buy Its Gaming GPUs
text: The chipmaker doesn't want speculative miners to disrupt its core business again.
